Tesuto is the worlds first commercially available hyper-scale network emulation and validation platform.  Tesuto enables network operators to make full-scale copies of production networks in the cloud including the same router/switch software versions and configurations.Network Operators use Tesuto for pre-deployment validation of proposed network changes, network segmentation for compliance, and real world lab environments for education and training, evaluating new hardware, and deep security testing.  All using the same tools and workflows that are deployed in production.Bottom line:  Want to know for sure your network change won't break the network and actually work as intended?  Tesuto makes that a reality (that can be automated).
